name: .ARFF File Extension
summary: Learn about .ARFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Weka, a machine learning application; saved in the the Attribute Relation File Format (ARFF) and contains a header section with a list of types (numeric, nominal string, date) and a data section with the values.

content: Weka and ARFF files can be used for tasks such as data clustering and regression.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
